testcase.name: Valid input calling cardLevelChecks will not throw exceptions testing : Ace should be allowed on empty stack
Valid input calling cardLevelChecks will not throw exceptions testing : two should be allowed in stack containing ace
Valid input calling cardLevelChecks will not throw exceptions testing : King should be allowed as first card in a column deck
Valid input calling cardLevelChecks will not throw exceptions testing : column deck with Diamond card should allow club card with decreased value of one
Valid input calling cardLevelChecks will not throw exceptions testing : column deck with Diamond card should allow spade card with decreased value of one
Valid input calling cardLevelChecks will not throw exceptions testing : column deck with hearts card should allow spade card with decreased value of one
Valid input calling cardLevelChecks will not throw exceptions testing : column deck with hearts card should allow club card with decreased value of one
Valid input calling cardLevelChecks will not throw exceptions testing : column deck with clubs card should allow hearts card with decreased value of one
Valid input calling cardLevelChecks will not throw exceptions testing : column deck with clubs card should allow diamond card with decreased value of one
Valid input calling cardLevelChecks will not throw exceptions testing : column deck with spade card should allow hearts card with decreased value of one
Valid input calling cardLevelChecks will not throw exceptions testing : column deck with spade card should allow diamond card with decreased value of one
Given the cards DIAMONDS JACK, DIAMONDS FIVE the method opposingCards will return false
Given the cards DIAMONDS JACK, HEARTS FIVE the method opposingCards will return false
Given the cards DIAMONDS JACK, SPADES SEVEN the method opposingCards will return true
Given the cards DIAMONDS JACK, CLUBS FIVE the method opposingCards will return true
Given the cards HEARTS TWO, HEARTS KING the method opposingCards will return false
Given the cards HEARTS TWO, DIAMONDS KING the method opposingCards will return false
Given the cards HEARTS TWO, SPADES KING the method opposingCards will return true
Given the cards HEARTS TWO, CLUBS KING the method opposingCards will return true
Given the cards CLUBS FIVE, CLUBS ACE the method opposingCards will return false
Given the cards CLUBS FIVE, SPADES ACE the method opposingCards will return false
Given the cards CLUBS FIVE, DIAMONDS ACE the method opposingCards will return true
Given the cards CLUBS FIVE, HEARTS ACE the method opposingCards will return true
Given the cards SPADES TEN, SPADES QUEEN the method opposingCards will return false
Given the cards SPADES TEN, CLUBS QUEEN the method opposingCards will return false
Given the cards SPADES TEN, DIAMONDS QUEEN the method opposingCards will return true
Given the cards SPADES TEN, HEARTS QUEEN the method opposingCards will return true
Given SPADES TEN redSuit should return false
Given CLUBS TEN redSuit should return false
Given DIAMONDS TEN redSuit should return true
Given HEARTS TEN redSuit should return true
Given a JOKER JOKER_BLACK redSuit should throw a exception
Given a JOKER JOKER_RED redSuit should throw a exception
